name: Find the exit (iTzCrazyShot)
description:
You wake up in a strange place with an unloaded gun, surrounded by many unknown beings, they try to kill you, but then you find a portal and enters it that takes you to another strange place, now we have left to do is go to the portal in order to find a way out.

In this game you use W, A, S, D to move and have to dodge the enemies and touch the portal to complete a level, taking you to another phase with more difficult enemies and in larger quantities, this game is short and not It must be long before it resets within 20 minutes, but it's fun and good to spend time.
